text.section: A person may not erect a pole or other structure in the sanitary district for the purpose of carrying wires overhead without first obtaining a permit from the Commission.

The Commission may:
require that plans for the location or construction of the pole or structure be filed with the Commission; and
charge a reasonable fee for the permit.
